item.title: spree /spree
item.description: An open source eCommerce platform giving you full control and customizability. Modular and API-first. Multi-vendor, multi-tenant, multi-store, multi-currency, multi-language. Built using Ruby on Rails. Developed by@vendo-dev

item.title: KoljaB /RealtimeSTT
item.description: A robust, efficient, low-latency speech-to-text library with advanced voice activity detection, wake word activation and instant transcription.

item.title: fluentassertions /fluentassertions
item.description: A very extensive set of extension methods that allow you to more naturally specify the expected outcome of a TDD or BDD-style unit tests. Targets .NET Framework 4.7, as well as .NET Core 2.1, .NET Core 3.0, .NET 6, .NET Standard 2.0 and 2.1. Supports the unit test frameworks MSTest2, NUnit3, XUnit2, MSpec, and NSpec3.

item.title: Freika /dawarich
item.description: Self-hosted alternative to Google Location History (Google Maps Timeline)

item.title: OpenBMB /MiniCPM-o
item.description: MiniCPM-o 2.6: A GPT-4o Level MLLM for Vision, Speech and Multimodal Live Streaming on Your Phone
